title: Doppler Labsâ€™ Here Active Listening System Will Ship In December
description: Back in June, Doppler Labs launched their second product on Kickstarter. The Here Active Listening system, created by cofounders Noah Kraft and Fritz Lanman, offered the world’s first audio AR experience by letting users control live sound with special effects and sliders for EQ levels. The plan was to create just 10,000 units of the first run, starting with a Kickstarter launch. But… Read More
